name: Jquery.circle.js
tagline: Circle is a Javascript global-menu library for jQuery.
body:
# Circle ## About ## Circle is a Javascript global-menu library for jQuery. ## Installation ## Just include the Javascript file after you've included jQuery. You need at least jQuery 1.4.2, but use the latest jQuery to get better performance ## Basic usage ## first make the global menu just as no style. just make sure that you get the .main and .menu in html. ```html
``` ```js $("#circle").circle(option); ``` the option is unnecessary,but you can customize it to make new action,also.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
